title: Im not getting my free RP
body: Im not getting my free 400 Rp and my account is lvl5, whats going on? Do they not do that anymore???!!??!

replies.body:
Hello Fallen Skys,

Yes, you're correct. After the Hextech Crafting system was launched, new players now get a New Player Chest instead of the 400 RP award. More context can be found in Riot Socrates' post here:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp
